articles.title: Brexit: Liz Truss tells EU she has ‘no choice’ but to act on Northern Ireland protocol - The Independent
articles.description: European Commission expresses ‘serious concern’ over ‘unacceptable’ UK stance
articles.content:
Liz Truss has set the scene for a furious Brexit spat with Europe, telling Brussels the UK will have no choice but to act over the Northern Ireland protocol unless the EU backs down.

articles.author: David Pierce, Jon Porter
articles.title: OnePlus' Nord Buds wireless earbuds: calls and music for $40 - The Verge
articles.description: OnePlus’ new Nord Buds earbuds offer Dolby Atmos support, fast charging, and long battery life for a surprisingly low price. They’ve been announced alongside two new European entries to the Nord lineup of smartphones.
articles.content:
Plus, two new Nord phones are coming to Europe soon
OnePlus latest set of wireless earbuds is also the first to get its Nord branding, which the company uses for its cheaper products. The new Nord B… [+2591 chars]

articles.author: Ray Thomas
articles.title: Shock split: Champion mare Verry Elleegant taken off Chris Waller - Racenet
articles.description: Chris Waller has vowed to do what he can to help Verry Elleegant make the transition to European racing after it was announced the champion mare will be transferred to a French trainer to continue her racing career.

articles.title: Ryanair says face masks will still be mandatory on flights to 15 EU countries - Dublin Live
articles.description: The update to the health safety measures for air travel was issued by the European Union Aviation Safety Agency (EASA) and European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) this morning
articles.content:
Ryanair has said that face masks will still be mandatory on flights to and from 15 EU countries despite the rule being dropped from next week.
